title: China Shifts Back to Emphasizing Economic Stability
sub_head: Chinese leaders pledge to keep growth stable after government’s policies to rein in risks have triggered a sharp economic slowdown
body:
HONG KONG—China shifted its focus back to keeping growth stable as a string of policies to curb debt and speculation have triggered a sharp economic slowdown, particularly in the property market.
“Ensuring stability is the top priority for the economy next year,” said leaders in a statement after a closed-door three-day economic conference, which was attended by Chinese President Xi Jinping.
